articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Barcelona's sad new reality: Bayern Munich prove Catalans can no longer compete with Europe's elite - Goal.com
articles.description: Gerard Pique said he was "hurt" to hear the jeers directed at Barcelona team-mate Sergi Roberto on Tuesday in a 3-0 Champions League group stage defeat to Bayern Munich.

articles.author: Denise Chow
articles.title: More Europeans are taking climate change seriously. In the U.S., not so much. - NBC News
articles.description: Intense concern about climate change is increasing among people in several major economies, according to a survey released Tuesday by the Pew Research Center.
articles.content: Intense concern about climate change is increasing among people in several major economies, according to a survey released Tuesday by the Pew Research Center that found that 72 percent of those polle… [+4624 chars]

articles.title: Jacinda Ardern defends climate change action after New Zealand's methane emissions targeted in global reduction push - Newshub
articles.description: The United States and European Union will reportedly pressure countries - including New Zealand - to commit to their methane reduction target.
articles.content: The Global Methane Pledge documents seen by Reuters purportedly show how the US and EU will attempt to convince over two dozen countries - including New Zealand - to join the methane reduction target… [+2711 chars]
